text: A Ballast is a large resistor that regulates the amount of electrical current in a circuit. Most ballasts are used for fluorescent lamps to regulate the current thru it, which might rise to a dangerous level and burn it out. Ballast is also crushed stone used in railway tracks. See ballast tamper. == Gallery == File:Magnetic Ballasts 1.jpg|3 Magnetic Ballasts: the ballast on the top is a Rapid start ballast, while the lower two ballasts are preheat ballasts.
